Title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Vongola Family Soutoujou! Vongola Shiki Shuugakuryokou, Kuru!!
Description: ['An internet-only stand-alone special episode of Katekyo Hitman Reborn! on the Shounen-Jump website, where the main characters go to various tourist spots in Japan. It will be made available on DVD in July 2010, and extra scenes will be included.']
Characters: ['Sawada, Tsunayoshi', 'Hibari, Kyouya', 'Gokudera, Hayato', 'Yamamoto, Takeshi', 'Reborn', 'Lambo', 'Sasagawa, Ryouhei', 'Belphegor', 'Squalo, Superbi', 'Dokuro, Chrome']
Voices: ['Kokubun, Yukari', 'Kondou, Takashi', 'Ichinose, Hidekazu', 'Inoue, Suguru', 'Neeko', 'Takeuchi, Junko', 'Kiuchi, Hidenobu', 'Fujiwara, Yuuki', 'Takahashi, Hiroki', 'Akesaka, Satomi']
